sightings.text: Saw a great big glowy cloud in the sky. Definitely a UFO! Might've seen an alien wave at me from inside.
sightings.summary: Glowy cloud shape UFO spotted in the sky.

sightings.text: Saw a ball of clouds in the sky, looked like the shape of a UFO!
Saw a big star that looked like a UFO
Saw a big star shaped UFO in the sky. It was burning bright and red. So beautiful!
sightings.summary: Red star shaped UFO spotted in the sky
